This means that the authors or copyright holders are not liable for any claim, damages, or other liability arising from the software or its use.

Regarding virus scan results, you can check the detection results for different operating systems on the [VirusTotal](https://www.virustotal.com/) website. The links provided are for [MacOS](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/...), [Linux-x86-64](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/...), [Linux-ARM64](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/...), and [Windows](https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/...). These links allow you to verify the safety of the software before downloading and using it.
